name: NortonCore
0:
”Alexa, ask Norton Core what is my Security Score”
”Alexa, ask Norton Core to pause the internet for Sarah”
”Alexa, ask Norton core to enable guest network for 7 days”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: norton core
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Norton Core protects your home Wi-Fi and connected devices. And, now with the Norton Core Alexa skills, you can interact with your Norton Core using voice commands.

For the first release we’re targeting some of Norton Core’s most used features. There will be more skills on the way. Please give us your feedback.

To enable the Norton Core skill is easy:

1. Go to your Amazon Alexa app and search for Norton Core skill
2. Select the “Enable” button. You will be asked to link your Norton Core account
3. To link to your Norton Core account, sign in using your Norton Core account credentials that you use to sign in to the Norton Core app. 
4. The following are commands that you can ask:
• Alexa, ask Norton Core my security score.
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to pause the internet
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to un-pause the internet
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to pause the internet for “a specific user”
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to un-pause the internet “a specific user”
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to enable guest network
• Alexa, ask Norton Core to disable guest network
